questDescription(asker_factionLeader==True)->[asker_nameFull], [asker_faction_leaderTitle] of the [asker_faction_name], is interested in establishing ties with societies on this world - societies such as yours!

If you choose to work with the [asker_faction_name], they will regularly send you quests that can be accomplished to earn standing, which grants access to their wide array of permit abilities. However, you will not be able to back out of this partnership without losing access to their permits... and when any of your bases is at a 'sky-high expectations' level of wealth, refusing or failing their quests may cause you to lose some of their goodwill.



<color=#FFB266>Information on the [asker_faction_name]:</color>
[factionDescFromDef]

questDescription->Accept this quest if, for some reason, you wish to dissolve your relationship with the [asker_faction_name]. This will cause the following effects:

- Your relations with them to drop to <color=#BD0000>-100</color>.
- All of their turrets will self-destruct, and all of their people will flee.
- You will be unable to use their permits until you re-establish a relationship with them.
- They will send you another Making Ties quest, but until you accept that one they will not send any other quests.
